12V 60A 50A vV Charger for Lithium Iron, Ternary, Lead Acid Batteries - Adjustable DC Charging Power

The ultimate power solution for your rechargeable batteries!

This versatile 12V60A 50A 12.6v14.6V Charger is designed to safely and effectively charge a wide range of battery chemistries, including Lithium Iron Phosphate (LiFePO4), Ternary, and Lead Acid.

  • Adjustable Voltage Output: Precisely tailor the charging voltage to match your specific battery needs with an output range from 12.6V to 14.6V.
  • High Current Capacity: Featuring a robust 60A charge current and a powerful 50A discharge capability, this charger can quickly and efficiently bring your batteries back to full power.
  • Universal Compatibility: Whether you're working with electric vehicles, off-grid systems, or simply need a reliable battery recharger, this versatile unit has you covered.

Experience the convenience and peace of mind that comes with knowing your batteries are always ready when you need them.

This versatile DC charger is designed to power and maintain a wide range of batteries, making it a valuable tool for hobbyists, automotive enthusiasts, and anyone working with lithium iron, ternary, or lead-acid battery systems.

  • Adjustable Output Voltage: Customize the charging voltage between 12.6V and 14.6V to perfectly match your specific battery requirements.
  • High Charging Current: Deliver a robust 50A of current for fast and efficient charging of various battery types.
  • Multiple Battery Compatibility: Supports lithium iron, ternary, and lead-acid batteries, ensuring versatility across different applications.
  • 12V Input: Designed to operate with a standard 12V power source, providing convenient connectivity.
  • Programmable Charging Modes: Fine-tune your charging process with adjustable settings for optimal performance and battery longevity.

This charger is equipped with the following specifications:

  • Voltage Output Range: 12.6V - 14.6V
  • Maximum Charging Current: 50A
  • Input Voltage: 12V

This DC charger offers numerous benefits for battery users:

  • Faster Charging Times: The high charging current enables efficient and rapid recharging of your batteries.
  • Extended Battery Lifespan: Precise voltage control and programmable charging modes help maximize the life of your batteries.
  • Versatility: Compatible with a wide range of battery chemistries, making it a valuable tool for diverse applications.
  • Improved Safety: The charger incorporates safety features to protect your batteries from overcharging and damage.

This versatile DC charger is designed for use in various settings:

  • Automotive Applications: Charge car batteries, deep-cycle marine batteries, or other lead-acid batteries used in vehicles.
  • Hobbyist Projects: Power and maintain batteries for RC cars, drones, or other hobby equipment.
  • Home & Workshop Use: Charge power tools, backup systems, or other devices reliant on batteries.

Remember to always consult your battery's specific charging guidelines and safety instructions before using this charger.
